pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functional Adjacency Spectral Embedding // Latent process embedding for functional network data with the Functional Adjacency Spectral Embedding. Fits smooth latent processes based on cubic spline bases. Also generates functional network data from three models, and evaluates a network generalized cross-validation criterion for dimension selection. For more information, see MacDonald, Zhu and Levina (2022+) arXiv:2210.07491.
